availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Greenup County, Kentucky farmer. Kentucky native. Married Elizabeth McAllister. Father of James McAllister, Charles McAllister, and Morris McAllister.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, District 2, p. 174. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, p. 721. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, Precinct 2, p. 48. “Harvey Cameron McAllister (1825-1896),” Find A Grave, memorial no. 8573811, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=8573811&ref=acom (accessed June 15, 2017).
